name: womanizing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour in which a man often has temporary sexual relationships with women or tries to get women to have sex with him: Both his first and second wives divorced him on account of his womanizing. He tried to continue his presidential campaign despite revelations of womanizing. See
womanize
More examplesFewer examplesHis friends got fed up with his drinking and womanizing.Violence, womanizing, and bad behaviour have entertained society since Shakespeare.For all his womanizing, Neil always planned to settle down with one woman.
(of a man) often having temporary sexual relationships with women or trying to get women to have sex with him: He was an illiterate, womanizing gambler. The character of the womanizing Jack may be infantile, but he's likable too. See
womanize
More examplesFewer examplesShe was abandoned by her womanizing husband.There is a stereotype of the male jazz musician as a womanizing free spirit.Steve McQueen played a psychopathic, womanizing bomber captain who tries to seduce his co-pilot's girlfriend.
